whoami.title: Who am I?
whoami.content: Hello, my name is Evan. I am a math teacher based in Sweden with a deep passion for computers, problem solving, and lifelong learning. Whether it's breaking down complex concepts or exploring new tech, I believe in one core principle: archive everything you see. Every challenge, every solution, every lesson, I treat it all as knowledge worth keeping and sharing. My goal is to help the next generation build not just skills, but a mindset ready for the world ahead.

education.title: Education
items: Linnaeus University: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
Halmstad University: Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education in Mathematics
